feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-02-08T02:09:25.787749Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Asciinema 3.0 将用 Rust 重写</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema/pull/579</id>; <updated>;2024-02 -08T01:12:06.280744Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema/pull/579"/>; <作者>; <name>;goranmoomin</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=goranmoomin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/81ae7c31f3b6ad03ce23e42c0ab716459bdfd51f076cd1ca15b06aa225a94218/asciinema/asciinema/拉/579"样式="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;即将推出的 3.0 版本将使用 Rust 进行完全重写，从而实现新功能和集成。这一变化还保证了更快的启动和更愉快的开发体验。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#asciinema-3-0-will-be-rewriting-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39296581" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;您想了解的 155M 炮弹生产情况</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jseliger< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#as-much-as-you-ever-wanted-to-know-about-155m -artillery-shell-product" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39296561" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;80行Python的搜索引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alexmolas.com/2024/02/05/a-search-engine-in-80-lines.html</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T20:09 ：06.282979Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.alexmolas.com/2024/02/05/a-search-engine-in-80-lines.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>; alexmolas</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alexmolas</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.alexmolas.com/ alexmolas.com/docs/search-engine/screenshot-fastapi-app.png" style="width: 220px; height: 94px;" />;<br />;文章详细介绍了作者使用Python从头开始创建搜索引擎的经验，目的是提高小型网站的可发现性。作者解释了搜索引擎的关键组件，包括爬虫、倒排索引、排序器和界面，并承认未来改进和开发的领域。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-search-engine-in-80-lines-of- python" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39293050" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;迪士尼将入股 Epic Games 1.5 亿美元</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cnbc.com/2024/02/07/disney-to-take-1point5-billion-stake-in-epic-games-maker-of-fortnite.html</id>; <已更新>;2024-02-07T22:09:06.283378Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cnbc.com/2024/02/07/disney-to-take-1point5-billion-stake-in- epic-games-maker-of-fortnite.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sp3n</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sp3n</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://image.cnbcfm.com/api/v1/image/107370350-1707326004937-gettyimages-1822369917-RAFAPRESS_04122023-09335.jpeg?v=1707326026&w=1920&h= 1080" 样式="宽度:220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;迪士尼向 Epic Games 投资 15 亿美元，标志着其在游戏行业的最大飞跃。此次合作将涉及创建新游戏和娱乐宇宙，其中包括来自迪士尼、皮克斯、漫威、星球大战等。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#disney-to-take-1-5b-stake-in-epic-games" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39294799" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;事实上，附录并不是没有用的</stitle>; <id>;https://www.npr .org/sections/health-shots/2024/02/02/1228474984/appendix-function-appendicitis-gut-health</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T22:09:06.283773Z</更新>; <link href ="https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2024/02/02/1228474984/appendix-function-appendicitis-gut-health"/>; <作者>; <名称>;数字铝</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Digit-Al</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.npr. org/assets/img/2024/02/01/heather-smith-anatomist-2-951a2a6d125145ef6c1404f2ce93cf213a86a339-s1100-c50.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：165px;" />;<br />;解剖学教授希瑟·史密斯 (Heather Smith) 发现阑尾支持免疫系统，并充当有益肠道细菌的安全屋。考虑到阑尾的健康状况，未来的治疗方法可以在不切除器官的情况下预防阑尾炎好处。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-appendix-is-not-in-fact-useless" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39294346" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;探索维基百科上列出的附近有趣的地点</stitle>; <id>;https://en.nearbywiki.org/map/</id>; <更新>; 2024-02-07T19:09:06.284560Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.nearbywiki.org/map/"/>; <author>; <name>;udev4096</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=udev4096</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://en.nearbywiki.org/assets/img/open- graph/en.default.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;探索维基百科上列出的附近有趣的地方。发现您所在地区或旅行目的地的景点和目的地。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#explore-interesting -places-nearby-listed-on-wikipedia" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39271345" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;台积电打造第二个日本芯片厂</stitle>; <id>;https://finance.yahoo.com/news/tsmc-build-second-japan-chip-105111276.html</id>; <updated>;2024-02-07T11:09： 06.285324Z</更新>; <link href="https://finance.yahoo.com/news/tsmc-build-second-japan-chip-105111276.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ytch</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ytch</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.yimg.com/ny /api/res/1.2/aR5v1Ac.glfeBpX3MeifkA--/YXBwaWQ9aGlnaGxhbmRlcjt3PTk2MDtoPTYyNg--/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/58ca756be0eb8bf5258cc57fef4461bf" style="width: 220px;高度：144px;" />;<br />;全球最大的代工芯片制造商台积电 (TSMC) 宣布计划在日本建设第二家工厂，计划于 2027 年底开始运营，从而筹集总投资其日本合资企业规模超过200亿美元，此次扩建得到了东京政府的支持，旨在恢复日本作为领先芯片制造中心的地位，并在中美贸易紧张局势下确保稳定的芯片供应，新工厂预计每月产能产能超过 100,000 片 12 英寸晶圆，适合各种应用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tsmc-to-build-second-japan-chip-factory" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39273830" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;乡村滑雪场陷入国际骗局</stitle>; <id>;https://www. newyorker.com/magazine/2024/02/05/the-rural-ski-slope-caught-up-in-an-international-scam</id>; <更新>;2024-02-08T00:09:06.285709Z</已更新>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2024/02/05/the-rural-ski-slope-caught-up-in-an-international-scam"/>; <作者>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /media.newyorker.com/photos/65b43b14fc7304eaa689ab04/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/240205_r43716.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：212px;" />;<br />;Jay Peak 滑雪场总经理 Bill Stenger 被美国证券交易委员会指控与其商业伙伴 Ariel Quiros 一起实施欺诈，滥用了 350 美元中的一半以上他们通过 EB-5 签证计划筹集了 100 万美元用于度假村扩建。尽管受到这些指控，斯滕格仍坚称自己是清白的，并且对滑雪行业充满热情。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-rural- Ski-slope-caught-up-in-an-international-scam" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39295868" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;FujiwaraChoki/MoneyPrinter：使用 MoviePy 自动创建 YouTube Shorts</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/FujiwaraChoki/MoneyPrinter</id>; <updated>;2024-02-07T23:09:06.286475Z</updated >; <link href="https://github.com/FujiwaraChoki/MoneyPrinter"/>; <作者>; <name>;rcarmo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/bec2d37e1b584241f981196a227b868af12548461936ccb344295640d1616749/FujiwaraChoki/MoneyPrinter" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文提供了有关如何使用 MoneyPrinter 项目在本地自动创建 YouTube Shorts 的指南。其中包括安装说明、服务器设置，并鼓励用户贡献。<a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#fujiwarachoki-moneyprinter-automate-creation-of-youtube-shorts-using-moviepy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39295526" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Localllm 可让您在本地 CPU 上开发新一代 AI 应用</stitle>; <id>;https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/application-development/new-localllm-让-you-develop-gen-ai-apps-locally-without-gpus</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T22:09:06.286855Z</更新>; <link href="https://cloud.google .com/blog/products/application-development/new-localllm-lets-you-develop-gen-ai-apps-locally-without-gpus"/>; <author>; <name>;srameshc</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=srameshc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-cloudblog-publish /images/General-GC_Blog_header_2436x1200-v1.max-700x700.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;本文介绍了“localllm”，该工具允许开发人员在 Google Cloud 工作站内的 CPU 上运行大型语言模型 (LLM)，从而无需使用 GPU。它强调了以下优点：提高了性能、成本效率、增强了数据安全性，并与 Google Cloud 服务无缝集成。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#localllm-lets-you-develop-gen-ai-apps-on- local-cpus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39294810" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unison Cloud</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.unison.cloud/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T17:09:06.287244Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.unison.cloud/"/>; <作者>; <name>;dcre</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dcre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /www.unison.cloud/assets/unison-cloud-social.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Unison Cloud 允许快速部署 HTTP 和 WebSocket 服务，专注于逻辑而不是基础设施管理。它提供服务间调用、独特的部署哈希、轻松的数据存储管理、整合日志等功能、安全秘密/配置库以及本地测试。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unison-cloud" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39290982" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：1 分钟内提高认知焦点</stitle>; <id>;https://onemillionfocus.com</id>; <更新>;2024-02- 07T13:09:06.288058Z</updated>; <link href="https://onemillionfocus.com"/>; <作者>; <name>;junetic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=junetic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://onemillionfocus.com/webclip.png" style="width: 220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;科学支持的方法，利用视觉聚焦 1 分钟来增加心理/认知焦点<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-improve-cognitive -focus-in-1-分钟" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39288039" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们如何进行微调Mistral-7B 不烂</stitle>; <id>;https://helixml.substack.com/p/how-we-got-fine-tuning-mistral-7b</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T22 :09:06.288445Z</updated>; <link href="https://helixml.substack.com/p/how-we-got-fine-tuning-mistral-7b"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lewq< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lewq</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#how-we-got-fine-tuning-mistral-7b-to-not-suck" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=39271658" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;将 Postgres 转变为快速 OLAP 数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.paradedb.com/pages/introducing_analytics</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T18:09： 06.288836Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.paradedb.com/pages/introducing_analytics"/>; <作者>; <name>;philippemnoel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=philippemnoel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://mintlify.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/paradedb-blog/images /clickbench_time.png" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;新扩展 pg_analytics 将 Postgres 数据库的分析性能提高了 94 倍，使其比 Elasticsearch 更快，几乎与 ClickHouse 一样快。它还引入了使用 Apache Arrow 和 DataFusion 实现高效列的“deltalake”表面向数据处理，无需外部分析数据存储。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#transforming-postgres-into-a-fast-olap-database" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39263760" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nvidia 的“Grace”Arm CPU 在 HPC 方面与 x86 保持着自己的优势</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.nextplatform.com/2024/02/06/nvidias-grace-arm-cpu-holds-its-own-against-x86-for-hpc/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T22： 09:06.289240Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nextplatform.com/2024/02/06/nvidias-grace-arm-cpu-holds-its-own-against-x86-for-hpc /"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;< img src =“https://www.nextplatform.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/nvidia-grace-die-shots.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 89px;" />;<br />;专为 HPC 仿真和建模工作负载而设计的 Nvidia Grace CG100 服务器处理器在主要超级计算实验室中显示出有希望的早期结果。Grace CPU 具有高核心数和低热足迹，可以组合成 Grace-Grace 超级芯片，为 HPC 系统提供显着的容量和性能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nvidia-s-grace-arm-cpu-holds-its-own -against-x86-for-hpc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39294433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hackintosh：适用于 HP 的 OpenCore EFI Pavilion Aero 13 笔记本电脑</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/aleixsr/HP-Pavilion-Aero-13-Hackintosh</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T20:09:06.290739Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/aleixsr/HP-Pavilion-Aero-13-Hackintosh"/>; <作者>; <name>;dithered_djinn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=dithered_djinn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/ae41f53577f19c055f6ff4de0ca304445d2e17382f5032e0cf0125c35f7acd07/aleixsr/HP-Pavilion-Aero-13- Hackintosh" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了针对 macOS 优化 13.3" WQXGA 显示器，建议使用独特的 SMBIOS 和 UMAF 工具。它还涵盖硬件兼容性问题、NVMe 修补、USB 映射和 AMD I2C 支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hackintosh-opencore-efi-for-hp-pavilion-aero-13-laptop" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39273430" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自适应卡：与平台无关的 UI 片段，以 JSON 格式编写</stitle>; <id>;https://adaptivecards.io/</id >; <更新>;2024-02-07T22:09:06.291112Z</更新>; <link href="https://adaptivecards.io/"/>; <作者>; <name>;kaypee901</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaypee901</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://adaptivecards.io/content/teams-logo.png"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：220像素；” />;<br />;“自适应卡、JSON 编写的 UI 片段可实现跨应用程序和平台的无缝集成和用户参与。它们还支持创建可重用模板以进行数据显示和工作流程集成。” <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#adaptive-cards-platform-agnostic-snippets-of-ui-authored-in-json" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39294372" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧洲最深的矿山将成为巨型重力电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.independent.co.uk/tech/ gravity-battery-mine-renewable-energy-b2492087.html</id>; <更新>;2024-02-08T00:09:06.291860Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.independent.co.uk /tech/gravity-battery-mine-renewable-energy-b2492087.html"/>; <author>; <name>;dithered_djinn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dithered_djinn</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.independent.co.uk/2024/02/07/14/gravity%20battery%20underground%20mine%20gravitricity.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：147px;“ />;<br />;苏格兰公司 Gravitricity 正在将芬兰的一个废弃矿井改造成一个巨型电池，用于存储可再生能源。该项目可能会给社区带来经济效益，并有助于满足全球电力需求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#europe-s-deepest-mine-to-become-giant-gravity-battery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39295769" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;员工抱怨老板“无能”且“无聊”，Google 士气大跌</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sfgate。 com/tech/article/google-workers-company-culture-pichai-18653877.php</id>; <更新>;2024-02-08T00:09:06.292228Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .sfgate.com/tech/article/google-workers-company-culture-pichai-18653877.php"/>; <author>; <name>;choppaface</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=choppaface</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;px-captcha <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#morale-plummets-at-google-as-workers -complain-bosses-are-inept-and-boring" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39295784" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;阴谋杀死 IE6 (2019)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.chriszacharias.com/a-conspiracy-to-kill-ie6</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T22:09:06.293367Z< /updated>; <link href="https://blog.chriszacharias.com/a-conspiracy-to-kill-ie6"/>; <作者>; <name>;lawrenceyan</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=lawrenceyan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cz.imgix.net/youtube-ie6-highlight.png?fm= pjpg&w=800&border=1000" style="宽度：220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;本文讲述了 2009 年 YouTube 的一小群 Web 开发人员如何计划逐步取消对 Internet Explorer 6 (IE6) 的支持，因为它存在问题。他们实施了一个横幅向 IE6 用户发出关于即将出现的缺乏支持的警告，这导致 IE6 使用率大幅下降，并间接鼓励其他网站效仿。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-conspiracy-to -kill-ie6-2019" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39294406" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;分类预写日志 (2023 ）</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.schmizz.net/disaggreated-wal</id>; <更新>;2024-02-07T18:09:06.293742Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /blog.schmizz.net/disaggreated-wal"/>; <作者>; <名称>;carlsverre </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=carlsverre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d1.awsstatic.com/product-page-diagram_Amazon-MemoryDB-for-Redis.38339d976bd9b151350f496469d4d54b21173523.png" style="width: 220px; height: 91px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了分布式系统的演变，重点介绍了 Google 使用 Colossus 和 AWS 的事务日志原语进行数据存储和复制。它表明需要无服务器系统，例如用于日志的 S3，促进设计创新并简化数据管理。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-disaggreated-write-ahead-log-2023" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39282054" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
